'''Strong''' is a [[Forest-Patrol Hound]] that can be found near the [[Statue of The Seven]] at [[Dihua Marsh]], [[Bishui Plain]], [[Liyue]].

Strong has chased [[Hui]] &mdash; implied to be a thief &mdash; up onto a rock, where the two are now at an impasse.
